name: Girlfriend`s sister
description:
This story telling you about a very hot situation in the life of teenagers. The guy has relations with the elder sister. But one day he had a really interesting situation with her young sister and something went wrong….or not?

“Girlfriend`s sister" is a nice adult story featuring:

- True story

- A lot of sexy scenes

- Realistic backgrounds

- Hot dialogues

- Relaxing background music
